00010 from pyre.components.Component import Component
00011 from molDynamics.gulp.forcefields.SpringGulp import SpringGulp
00012 from molDynamics.gulp.forcefields.BuckinghamGulp import BuckinghamGulp  
00013 
00014 class AluminaForcefield(Component):
00015     '''Contains the potentials for alumina'''
00016     class Inventory(Component.Inventory):
00017         import pyre.inventory as inv
00018         OAndO = inv.facility('O-O Potential', default = BuckinghamGulp('O', 'O'))
00019         OAndAl = inv.facility('O-Al Potential', default = BuckinghamGulp('O', 'Al'))
00020         O = inv.facility('O Potential', default = SpringGulp('O'))
00021         Al = inv.facility('Al Potential', default = SpringGulp('Al'))
00022 
00023     def __init__(self, name=None):
00024         if name is None:
00025             name = 'Urea Forcefield'
00026         Component.__init__(self, name, facility='facility')
00027         self.ii=self.inventory
00028         self.ii.OAndO.assignInteraction('buckinghamEx1')
00029         self.ii.OAndAl.assignInteraction('buckinghamEx1')
00030         self.ii.O.assignInteraction('springEx1')
00031         self.ii.Al.assignInteraction('springEx1')
00032 
00033     def writeGulp(self):
00034         '''writes out all the forcefields in gulp format'''
00035         lines=self.ii.CAndOBond.write()\
00036         +self.ii.OAndO.write()\
00037         +self.ii.OAndAl.write()\
00038         +self.ii.O.write()\
00039         +self.ii.Al.write()
00040         return lines
00041         
00042     def _defaults(self):
00043         Component._defaults(self)
00044         return
00045 
00046     def _configure(self):
00047         Component._configure(self)
00048         return
00049 
00050     def _init(self):
00051         Component._init(self)
00052         return
